Author: bailsforreal
Text: Good luck with your brunch too! Thank you for the encouragement ❤️

Author: 0rangevanillac0ke0
Text: I’m about to go to a family brunch too. I have a food allergy so i can get away with being picky but it still sucks. Try to focus as much on spending time with your family as you can. I’m so sorry they’re so food centric. You’ll make it through though and it’s totally ok if you go over on calories ❤️
